name: For The Rum
description:
Global Game Jam 2017 Submision

Pirates fighting for the biggest booty. 

It's a 3D party-game made with unity that consists in boats fighting each other to death!

Controls:

Player 1:

W,A,S,D - Move

G,H - Shoot Left/Right

Player 2:

Arrow Keys - Move

" ; "  " . "  - Shoot Left/Right
